blade_choice.title: The Blade Awakens
blade_choice.text:
As your hand closes around the sword's hilt, the Traveler's Stone pulses 
with energy. The blade suddenly blazes with magical power, and you must choose 
its elemental aspect:

üî• FLAME - Burns enemies and lights the darkest paths
‚ùÑÔ∏è ICE - Freezes foes and extinguishes fires
‚ö° LIGHTNING - Strikes with speed and chains between enemies

"Choose the element that resonates with your soul," the King says.

[WEAPON ACQUIRED: Royal Blade]

axe_choice.title: The Axe Awakens
axe_choice.text:
As you grasp the great axe, its weight feels perfect in your hands. The 
Traveler's Stone responds, and magical energy courses through the weapon.
Now choose its element:

üî• FLAME - Each swing leaves trails of fire
‚ùÑÔ∏è ICE - Shatters enemies like brittle ice
‚ö° LIGHTNING - Thunderous impacts stun nearby foes

"The axe has chosen you as surely as you have chosen it," King Hellstrom 
observes. "Now bind it with elemental power."

[WEAPON ACQUIRED: Great Axe]

bow_choice.title: The Bow Awakens
bow_choice.text:
The mystic bow feels alive in your hands, its string humming with barely 
contained power. The Traveler's Stone glows brighter, offering you a choice 
of elements:

üî• FLAME - Arrows of fire that explode on impact
‚ùÑÔ∏è ICE - Freezing arrows that create walls of ice
‚ö° LIGHTNING - Bolts that leap between multiple targets

"An excellent choice," the King nods approvingly. "Few can master the mystic 
arts of the bow. Now, choose your element."

[WEAPON ACQUIRED: Mystic Bow]
